<p>The <strong>Magic Andorra Hotel<\/str:
The Magic Andorra Hotel is a 4-star accommodation located in the heart of Andorra la Vella, the capital of Andorra. It is in a privileged location, next to the Valira River and close to the main shopping avenue, making it ideal for those who wish to enjoy both outdoor activities and shopping.

Main features:

  • Rooms: Offers modern and comfortable rooms, many with river or city views. They are equipped with flat-screen TVs, minibars, safes and free Wi-Fi. Superior rooms may include whirlpool tubs.
  • Facilities:
  • Spa and wellness: The hotel has a spa area with a Jacuzzi, sauna and Turkish bath, making it a great place to relax after a day of mountain activities.
  • Gym: A gym is available for guests who want to stay active.
  • Restaurant and bar: There is a restaurant serving international cuisine and a bar/cafeteria where drinks and snacks can be enjoyed in a cozy atmosphere.
  • Location: Within walking distance of shopping centers such as Pyrénées Andorra and tourist attractions such as the Caldea spa, one of the largest thermal spas in Europe. It is also a good base for those who want to practice winter sports in nearby ski resorts such as Grandvalira or Vallnord.
<p>The Magic Ski Hotel is a 4-star hotel:
The Magic Ski Hotel is a 4-star hotel located in the heart of La Massana, in the principality of Andorra. It is ideal for ski and nature lovers, as it is located right next to the cable car that connects directly to the ski slopes of Vallnord-Pal Arinsal, which makes it a very comfortable option for skiers.

Main features:

  • Privileged location: The hotel is located in the center of La Massana, surrounded by stores, bars and restaurants. Its proximity to the gondola lift offers quick access to the slopes, making it an ideal location in both winter and summer for outdoor sports.
  • Facilities: It has 84 spacious and comfortable rooms, decorated in a classic and functional style. It offers a series of services such as a spa with Jacuzzi, sauna, Turkish bath and heated pool, ideal for relaxing after a day in the mountains.
  • Restaurant: The hotel has a restaurant that serves buffet breakfast and dinner with local and international dishes, ideal to recharge your batteries after a day of activity.
  • Family and cozy atmosphere: It is a hotel suitable for families as well as for couples and groups of friends, as it offers a cozy and warm atmosphere.
  • Activities: In addition to skiing in winter, in summer it offers easy access to hiking trails, cycling and adventure activities in the mountains.
